title: Fixed dimensions in docs of conv and conv_transpose
body_html:
In the documentation of torch.nn.functional.conv{1,3}d, changed the weight dimensions
from: out_channels x in_channels x kH x kW
to: out_channels x in_channels/groups x kH x kW .

In the docs of torch.nn.functional.conv_transpose{1,2,3}d, changed the weight dimensions
from: in_channels x out_channels x kH x kW.
to: in_channels x out_channels/groups x kH x kW .

These changes were discussed in the issue report here.
Note that the docs of torch.nn.functional.conv2d already included the division by 'groups' in the weight dimensions.
body_text:
In the documentation of torch.nn.functional.conv{1,3}d, changed the weight dimensions
from: out_channels x in_channels x kH x kW
to: out_channels x in_channels/groups x kH x kW .
In the docs of torch.nn.functional.conv_transpose{1,2,3}d, changed the weight dimensions
from: in_channels x out_channels x kH x kW.
to: in_channels x out_channels/groups x kH x kW .
These changes were discussed in the issue report here.
Note that the docs of torch.nn.functional.conv2d already included the division by 'groups' in the weight dimensions.
body:
In the documentation of torch.nn.functional.conv{1,3}d, changed the weight dimensions
from: out_channels x in_channels x kH x kW
to: out_channels x in_channels/**groups** x kH x kW .

In the docs of torch.nn.functional.conv_transpose{1,2,3}d, changed the weight dimensions
from: in_channels x out_channels x kH x kW.
to: in_channels x out_channels/**groups** x kH x kW .

These changes were discussed in the issue report [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/5521).
Note that the docs of torch.nn.functional.conv2d already included the division by 'groups' in the weight dimensions.
